summary: The rigid principles of a devout Catholic man are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.
cast: Jean-Louis Trintignant|Françoise Fabian|Marie-Christine Barrault|Antoine Vitez|Léonide Kogan|Guy Léger|Anne Dubot|Marie Becker|Marie-Claude Rauzier
title: Mi noche con Maud
